price: Rabbiini hamtuu guyyaa gaafasii irraa isaan tikseeti (fuula isaaniis) ifaafi gammachuu qunnamsiise.
arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمۡ نَضۡرَةٗ وَسُرُورٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fawaqāhumu al-lahu sharra dhālika al-yawmi walaqqāhum naḍratan wasurūran
translations: and will cause them to meet
